prompt:
The following text has been extracted from a handwritten financial report form using OCR. The text may contain errors due to the OCR process. Your task is to carefully read the text and extract the relevant information, organizing it into the following JSON format:

{
  "date": "DD/MM/YYYY",
  "err_id": "Emergency Room Number",
  "expenses": [
    {
      "activity": "Activity Description",
      "description": "Description of Expenses",
      "payment_date": "DD/MM",
      "seller": "Seller/Recipient Details",
      "payment_method": "Payment Method (Cash/Bank App)",
      "receipt_no": "Receipt Number",
      "amount": "Expense Amount"
    }
    // ... More items can be added if found
  ],
  "financial_summary": {
    "total_expenses": "Total Expenses in Sudanese Pounds",
    "total_grant_received": "Total Grant Received",
    "total_other_sources": "Total Amount from Other Sources",
    "remainder": "Remaining Amount"
  },
  "additional_questions": {
    "excess_expenses": "Response on covering excess expenses",
    "surplus_use": "Response on use of surplus",
    "lessons_learned": "Response on lessons learned from budget planning",
    "training_needs": "Response on additional training needs"

  "unused_text": {

    "potentially_useful_information": "Text segments that may contain useful information not captured in the fields above"

Please follow these instructions:

1. Read the text carefully, even if it contains errors or is unclear.
2. Extract all possible information and fill in the corresponding fields in the JSON.
3. If you cannot find some information, leave the field empty or write "Not available".
4. Do not add information that is not present in the text.
5. Maintain the exact JSON structure provided.
6. After extracting the relevant information, categorize any remaining text into two categories:
   - "likely_ocr_errors": Text that appears to be errors from the OCR process.
   - "potentially_useful_information": Text that may be important but was not included in the fields above.
7. Include these categories in the "unused_text" section of the JSON.

Here is the text:

${cleanedText}

Please return the information in JSON format only without any additional explanation.
